title: BNY Mellon's Pandiri on Real Time Data For Asset Flows (Audio)
itunes:title: BNY Mellon's Pandiri on Real Time Data For Asset Flows (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Samir Pandiri, Executive Vice President and Global CEO of Asset Servicing at BNY Mellon, on regulation, big data and the fintech challenge. Broadcasting live from the BNY Mellon Asset Servicing Conference in Tuscon, Arizona.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
